name: Barbarian
shortDescription: Ferocious warriors who channel primal fury into devastating combat power.
description: Barbarians are driven by instinct and rage. In battle, they enter a primal state that enhances their strength, resilience, and ferocity beyond mortal limits.

features.name: Rage
features.description: On your turn, you can enter a rage as a bonus action. While raging, you gain advantage on Strength checks and saves, bonus damage on Strength-based melee attacks, and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: While not wearing armor, your Armor Class equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier.

features.name: Reckless Attack
features.description: You can attack recklessly, gaining advantage on melee weapon attacks using Strength, but attack rolls against you have advantage until your next turn.

features.name: Danger Sense
features.description: You have advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects you can see, such as traps and spells.

subclass.label: Primal Path
subclass.description: Choose a primal path that shapes the source of your rage.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Extra Attack
features.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

features.name: Fast Movement
features.description: Your speed increases by 10 feet while you arenâ€™t wearing heavy armor.

features.name: Primal Path Feature
features.description: You gain a feature granted by your chosen primal path.

features.name: Feral Instinct
features.description: You have advantage on initiative rolls, and you can act normally on your first turn even if surprised.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Brutal Critical
features.description: You roll one additional weapon damage die when determining the extra damage for a critical hit.

features.name: Primal Path Feature
features.description: You gain another feature from your chosen primal path.

features.name: Relentless Rage
features.description: When you drop to 0 hit points while raging, you can make a Constitution saving throw to drop to 1 hit point instead.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Brutal Critical
features.description: You roll two additional weapon damage dice when determining the extra damage for a critical hit.

features.name: Primal Path Feature
features.description: You gain a powerful feature from your chosen primal path.

features.name: Persistent Rage
features.description: Your rage only ends early if you fall unconscious or choose to end it.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Brutal Critical
features.description: You roll three additional weapon damage dice when determining the extra damage for a critical hit.

features.name: Indomitable Might
features.description: If your Strength check total is less than your Strength score, you can use that score instead.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Primal Champion
features.description: Your Strength and Constitution scores increase by 4, and their maximums increase to 24.
